name: A trip back down Spoon River
name_original: A trip back down Spoon River
description:
A trip back down Spoon River is a short interactive experience I developed, based on Edgar Lee Masters' Spoon River Anthology, a series of poems. The experience, as well as the poems, explore the memories of the deceased residents of the small town of Spoon River.

I built this experience in Unity from scratch over the course of a couple of months. All 3D assets, shaders, scripts and most 2D assets were made by me. I used Blender for modelling, Substance Painter and Designer for texturing, as well as the Adobe suite for graphic design.

I am an (aspiring) 3D artist, not a programmer, game designer or literature expert, so this is more of a portfolio piece rather than a game with widespread appeal. However, I'll be very happy if you enjoy it for what it is!

More info, such as screens, assets and interactive models on my ArtStation page:
https://www.artstation.com/subjectn
